author: Jessica
excerpt: Another week!! I am still so mind blown it’s may! Monday morning walks. Jordan is obsessed with cleaning everything. Working on some of the deck furniture! Birthday celebrations! This cake was goooood. School drop off fun. We had really bad storms this week and the kids ended up not having school due to loss of […]
text: Another week!! I am still so mind blown it’s may! Monday morning walks. Jordan is obsessed with cleaning everything. Working on some of the deck furniture! Birthday celebrations! This cake was goooood. School drop off fun. We had really bad storms this week and the kids ended up not having school due to loss of power. SO nature walk it is! Nature scavenger hunt, I should say. Cutie BFFs. Jordan lives for a playground. Post picnic nap. So cute! He found more sunglasses. Emilia has like 75 birthday parties to attend this month. This one will probably be a core memory because it POURED and the kids played in the rain… …and had so much fun! Dressing himself. Down to the boots. Hair before. And after! For her voice and piano recitals! I love that her little toes don’t touch the floor!!! And how proud she was after. Max was sooo cute and proud of her. Then she was basically roller blade barbie for another birthday. Fun busy weekend and this week is bananas!
html:
Another week!!

I am still so mind blown it’s may!

Monday morning walks.

Jordan is obsessed with cleaning everything. Working on some of the deck furniture!

Birthday celebrations!

This cake was goooood.

School drop off fun.

We had really bad storms this week and the kids ended up not having school due to loss of power. SO nature walk it is!

Nature scavenger hunt, I should say.

Cutie BFFs.

Jordan lives for a playground.

Post picnic nap.

So cute!

He found more sunglasses.

Emilia has like 75 birthday parties to attend this month.

This one will probably be a core memory because it POURED and the kids played in the rain…

…and had so much fun!

Dressing himself. Down to the boots.

Hair before.

And after!

For her voice and piano recitals!

I love that her little toes don’t touch the floor!!!

And how proud she was after.

Max was sooo cute and proud of her.

Then she was basically roller blade barbie for another birthday.

Fun busy weekend and this week is bananas!
